where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | NOT ( SIZEOF ( [ 'CONSTRUCTIVE_SOLID_GEOMETRY_2D_MIM.CSG_SOLID' , 'CONSTRUCTIVE_SOLID_GEOMETRY_2D_MIM.MAPPED_ITEM' , 'CONSTRUCTIVE_SOLID_GEOMETRY_2D_MIM.AXIS2_PLACEMENT_2D' ] * TYPEOF ( it ) ) = 1 ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( SIZEOF ( [ 'CONSTRUCTIVE_SOLID_GEOMETRY_2D_MIM.CSG_SOLID' ] * TYPEOF ( it ) ) = 1 ) OR ( ( 'CONSTRUCTIVE_SOLID_GEOMETRY_2D_MIM.MAPPED_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( 'CONSTRUCTIVE_SOLID_GEOMETRY_2D_MIM.' + 'CSG_2D_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF ( it \ mapped_item . mapping_source . mapped_representation ) ) ) ) ) >= 1

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( it <* SELF . items | ( ( 'CONSTRUCTIVE_SOLID_GEOMETRY_2D_MIM.MAPPED_ITEM' IN TYPEOF ( it ) ) AND ( NOT ( ( 'CONSTRUCTIVE_SOLID_GEOMETRY_2D_MIM.' + 'CSG_2D_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' ) IN TYPEOF ( it \ mapped_item . mapping_source . mapped_representation ) ) ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF ( TYPEOF ( SELF ) - TYPEOF ( SELF \ shape_representation || SELF \ csg_2d_shape_representation || SELF \ representation ) ) = 0
